subject: [PATCH v1 3/3] cxl/region: Factor out interleave granularity setup

reviews.author: alejandro.lucero-palau (author)
reviews.summary: The author is addressing a concern about the interleave granularity setup, specifically that it should be based on the endpoint type HDM-D[B] for Type2 devices/drivers support. The author explains that the current code preserves current functionality and adapts to required Type2 functionality.
reviews.raw_body:
From: Alejandro Lucero <alucerop@amd.com>

In preparation for Type2 devices/drivers support, these next patches
adapt the cxl region code for required Type2 functionality preserving
current functionality.

Alejandro Lucero (3):
  cxl: Make region type based on endpoint type
  cxl/region: Factor out interleave ways setup
  cxl/region: Factor out interleave granularity setup

 drivers/cxl/core/region.c | 87 +++++++++++++++++++++++++--------------
 1 file changed, 56 insertions(+), 31 deletions(-)


base-commit: 6de23f81a5e08be8fbf5e8d7e9febc72a5b5f27f
-- 
2.34.1

reviews.author: alejandro.lucero-palau (author)
reviews.summary: Author addressed a concern about the interleave granularity setup being tightly coupled to user-space sysfs region setup, and explained that they are factoring out a common helper from this setup for kernel-driven region creation.

reviews.author: alejandro.lucero-palau (author)
reviews.summary: Author addressed a concern about the interleave granularity setup being tightly coupled to user-space sysfs interface, agreed to factor out a common helper for kernel-driven region creation, and confirmed that this patch is part of a larger series (v1) with further revisions planned.

reviews.author: Dave Jiang
reviews.summary: Reviewer Dave Jiang questioned whether the patch set depends on a separate preparation set, requesting clarification on their interdependence.
reviews.raw_body:
Does this set depends on the preparation set [1] or is independent?

[1]: https://lore.kernel.org/linux-cxl/20260223142633.2994082-1-alejandro.lucero-palau@amd.com/T/#t

reviews.author: Dave Jiang
reviews.summary:
Reviewer Dave Jiang suggested changing the __create_region() function to accept an additional enum cxl_decoder_type parameter, noting that this is necessary because there's also auto region creation

Gave Reviewed-by
reviews.raw_body:
s/is/can be/

Since there's also auto region creation.
